await box.retrieve()

3
let provider = await ethers.getDefaultProvider()
await box.store(42)
const box = await Box.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
const Box = await ethers.getContractFactory("Box")
const box = await Box.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
const box = await box.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
const Box = await ethers.getContractFactory("Box")
await box.retrieve()

const box = await Box.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
